definition: meager/slight/weak/ungenerous or unkind/frivolous/to despise/to belittle/to look down on/to approach or near

sentences.english: The nanocrystalline TiO2 film is sensitized by dyestuff with dip and absorption.
sentences.chinese: 採用浸漬吸附法對納米晶二氧化鈦薄膜進行染料敏化。

sentences.english: In the computation of wave diffraction, thin layer of water is employed to simulate the breakwater.
sentences.chinese: 在計算堤後繞射中，採用了堤上薄膜水的方法。

sentences.english: BCN thin films were grown by RF reactive sputtering.
sentences.chinese: 用射頻反應濺射法制備出BCN薄膜。

sentences.english: Electrophosresis in discontinuous buffer system was applied for the presenting patterns and fractions of the pancreatic amylase isoenzymes.
sentences.chinese: 應用不連續緩衝系統薄膜電泳法行酶譜分析。

sentences.english: A method for determining both the optical constants and the thickness of thin films from transmission spectrum has been presented.
sentences.chinese: 給出了確定透明均勻薄膜光學常數和厚度的方法。

sentences.english: The light-converting efficiency has been researched with photocurrent measurements.
sentences.chinese: 光生電流譜研究了薄膜的光電轉換效率。

sentences.english: The surface of the sea seems to be an invisible membrane between the water and the air.
sentences.chinese: 海的表面似乎是隔在水與空氣間的一層看不見的薄膜。

sentences.english: Along the length of the filter, the interference film looks like a wedge .
sentences.chinese: 沿薄膜的長度方向看干涉膜似尖劈。

sentences.english: All films show the polycrystalline anatase TiO2 structure.
sentences.chinese: 薄膜均爲多晶銳鈦礦結構。

sentences.english: The screw dislocation in the film strongly influences the properties of the YBCO.
sentences.chinese: 在薄膜中的螺旋位錯強烈地影響YBCO的性質。

sentences.english: This paper describes a middling-power thin Film attenuator used for microwave circuits.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了一種用於微波電路的中功率薄膜衰減器。

sentences.english: Put plastic wrap around the door frame of a commonly used door.
sentences.chinese: 找一扇常用的門，沿門框把整扇門用塑料薄膜包起來。

sentences.english: A theoretical model is proposed for the abnormal grain growth in thin films of columnar grains.
sentences.chinese: 針對柱狀晶薄膜，建立了異常晶粒生長理論模型。

sentences.english: For the annular membranes, the concentric rigid inclusion make the maximal deflection become smaller than circular membranes.
sentences.chinese: 當薄膜帶有剛性中心時，能使薄膜的中心撓度減小。

sentences.english: For the annular membranes, the concentric rigid inclusion make the maximal deflection become smaller than circular membranes.
sentences.chinese: 當薄膜帶有剛性中心時，能使薄膜的中心撓度減小。

sentences.english: Therefore, formation of high valance vanadium oxide films was obtained.
sentences.chinese: 因此，形成價態更高的釩氧化物薄膜。

definition: plastic film (abbr. for 塑料薄膜[su4 liao4 bo2 mo2])
